content: shop hop 2013 a river runs through mitt by aimee pelletier grab your knitting and a cup o joe and meet us at the st croix river materials us7 needles double point or magic loop pick your pleasure instructions cable needle or not… tapestry needle cast on 37 stitches place start of round marker and join yarn sweet georgia superwash worsted to work in round 200yds/115g rounds 1 16 work 18 stitches of chart wc p1 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round color dka exclusive color river rounds 17 32 repeat rounds 1-16 size rounds 33 37 wc knit to end of round average adult change size easily round 38 right hand only wc k2 pm k1 pm by adding or removing stitches in k2 m1l k6 m1l k6 m1l k2 40 stitches multiples of 2 or decrease needle size round 38 left hand only wc k2 m1l k6 m1l k6 m1l k2 pm k1 pm k2 40 stitches gauge 20 stitches x 28 row = 4 in round 39 wc knit to marker sm m1l knit to 1 stockinette stitch stitch before marker m1r sm knit to end of round round 40 wc knit to marker sm knit all stitches abbreviations/definitions between markers sm knit to end of round rounds 41 49 repeat 2 previous row until you k=knit have 13 stitches between the markers 52 stitches p = purl round 50 wc knit to first marker remove thumb wc = work 18 stitches of chart markers and put 13 stitches on holder knit to end of k1tbl = knit 1 stitch through the back loop round 39 stitches pm = place marker rounds 51 56 wc knit to end of round sm = slip marker round 57 wc k2 k2tog k3 k2tog k3 k2tog k3 m1l = make one stitch left leaning lift bar k2tog k2 35 stitches between stitches from front to back and knit rounds 58 64 wc p1 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to through the back loop end of round m1r = make one stitch right leaning lift bar rounds 65 & 66 wc row 1 and 2 p1 *k1tbl p1 between stitches from back to front and knit repeat from * to end of round through the front loop cn = cable needle bind off all stitches in pattern shop hop 2013 page 2 thumb put held off stitches back onto needles knit 1 round picking up 3 stitches pattern tips & notes knit 1 more round and bind off t his is the perfect pattern to learn how to left hand chart cable without a cable needle
